RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 80. Claiming Purse 21000. FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD OR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Claiming races for $20,000 o r less not considered in eligibility and allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS MELODY set a well handled place from the start. drew off on the turn and was kept to task in the stretch to be clearly much the best. KITTY MACLEAN chased the early pace while three wide into the turn, made a bid but was no match for the winner in late stretch. JUDY'S MS. OFFICER was unhurried early then rallied and was three wide in the stretch, was making a ground while showing late foot in the end. IGGY BIGS chased the early pace while inside on the turn, made a bid to upper stretch then faltered in the stretch drive. CRYSTAL SNOW raced four wide on the turn but faltered in the stretch drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Judy's Ms. Officer
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied, 3 wide stretch, late foot

ENTRY.NAME: Iggy Bigs
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside turn, bid, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Melody
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well handled, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Kitty Maclean
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide turn, bid, no match for winner

ENTRY.NAME: Crystal Snow
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide turn, faltered stretch,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (P reference by condition eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MYSWEETANNALYZE bumped at the start then stalked the pace while inside into the turn, rallied and was two wide for the stretch drive, wore down SPECIALIZIN in late stretch to be be best in the end. SPECIALIZIN set the pace and drew off into the turn, was in a long drive but could not last in late stretch. R KATIEBUG was unhurried early and raced four wide into the turn, moved to the inside in mid stretch but failed to menace. MAGNA MASSA broke out and bumped at the start, stalked the pace while three wide on the turn then faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Magna Massa
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, bumped, stalked pace, 3 wide turn, faltered,

ENTRY.NAME: Mysweetannalyze
ENTRY.COMMENT: bump, stalked pace, inside, rallied 2w, wore down rivals, up late

ENTRY.NAME: R Katiebug
ENTRY.OWNER: Cherrywood Racing Stables II and Oak Rock Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, 4 wide turn, moved inside, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Specializin
ENTRY.OWNER: Patricia's Hope LLC Mulvihill Michael Mustari Frank A Craftyhorse Racing LLC Sch
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off into turn, long dive, could not last,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 3 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming races for $8,500 or less not considered in estimating allow ances). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and One-Sixteenth on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PRANCIPANTS set a well rated pace from the start, drew off turning for home and was ridden out in the end with confidence. TIMELESS GLORY pressed the pace while two wide on the backstretch, was hard used into the far turn then faltered in the stretch drive. ON A TOUR was unhurried early then raced three wide on the backstretch, failed to menace in the stretch drive. NO NANNETTE NO chased the early pace while inside on the backstretch then tired in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Prancipants
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well rated, drew off upper stretch, ridden out,

ENTRY.NAME: Timeless Glory
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide backstretch, hard used, faltered stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: On a Tour
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, 3 wide backstretch, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: No Nannette No
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside backstretch, tired stretch

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 4 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Claiming Purse 15500. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $15,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GOLD SMOKE pressed the pace while two wide on the backstretch, rallied on the far turn and was in a long sustained drive and proved best in the end. LARRY THE POET set a pressured pace while inside on the backstretch, drew off into the far turn then was in a long drive but weakened in late stretch while drifting out in the end. ICE VORTEX was unhurried early while two wide on the backstretch, made a mild rally on the far turn to upper stretch but was no menace in late stretch. ARMAVIR was allowed to settled while inside, made a bid on the far turn but failed to respond in the stretch drive. CRUISING ALTITUDE was hard to load then stalked the early pace while three wide on the backstretch, was used up and gave way on the far turn. SOHAN was unruly in the gate before the start then appeared to disliked the track surface and was far back on the backstretch, was eased up in the stretch and walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Armavir
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside backstretch, bid, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Gold Smoke
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide backstretch, rallied, long drive, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Sohan
ENTRY.COMMENT: unruly gate, disliked track, far back, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Ice Vortex
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, mild rally 2nd turn, bid, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Larry the Poet
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, inside, drew off, long drive, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Cruising Altitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: hard to load, stalk pace 3w backstretch, used up, gave way

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 17500. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Pri ce $8,500 (Claiming races for $5,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SAMARITA dueled for the lead while inside, was in a long sustained drive and drew off in late stretch to be best in the end. FIRST KITTEN dueled for the lead while two wide into the turn, was in a long drive throughout and weakened in late stretch. GO STORMIN GIRL was unhurried early then rallied four wide in the stretch but was no menace. APRIL'S GEM was saving ground on the turn then made a bid but was no menace in late stretch. ORDAINED KISS chased the early pace while three wide on the backstretch then gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Samarita
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, inside, drew off late stretch, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: April's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground turn, bid, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stormin Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied, 4 wide stretch, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: First Kitten
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide turn, long drive, weakened late stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: Ordained Kiss
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, used up, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 6 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or ov er since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. (Claiming races for $20,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances) (Preference by condition eligibility). In the event that this race is taken off the turf it will be contested at One Mile and Seventy Yards on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JOURNEYIST vied for the lead while three wide on the backstretch, rallied on the far turn then drew away in upper stretch and was kept to task in late stretch. DIALED INNA vied for the lead while inside on the backstretch, was in a long drive and gamely dug in to hold the place safe in the end. HARVEY'S PRINCESS was unhurried early and settled on the run down the backstretch, rallied on the far turn then was inside for the stretch drive but was out finished for the place in the final stride. BERTRADA stalked the pace while four wide on the backstretch, made a bid into the far turn and faltered in the drive. SHE'S WANDAFUL was taken back on the first turn off the pace to moved out to be two wide down the backstretch, vied from between rivals into the far turn then gave way in the stretch drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Journeyist
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3 wide, rallied, drew away, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Harvey's Princess
ENTRY.OWNER: S B Stables LLC and Thorough Crowd
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, rallied, inside stretch, out finished for place

ENTRY.NAME: She's Wandaful
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back, vied for lead, 2 wide, long drive, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Dialed Inna
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside backstretch, long drive, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Bertrada
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide backstretch, bid, faltered,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 92. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $6,500 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $13,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $13,500 (Claimi ng races for $10,000 or less not considered in allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHACKLEFORD STRONG dueled for the lead while two wide into the turn, was in a strong drive and drew off in upper stretch then was kept to a drive to late stretch when clear. LUCKY SHOT dueled for the lead from the inside into the turn, was in a long drive but weakened in mid stretch and held the place safe in the end. TRY TRY AGAIN was settled then raced four wide on the turn, made a mild rally in the stretch but was no threat. WEST WARPATH was inside on the turn and saving ground then failed to menace in the stretch. FULL MAGAZINE raced three wide into the turn making a bid but flattened out in the drive. PAYSTER was through after a half then gave way. LONESTAR CHROME trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Shot
ENTRY.OWNER: Dundalk 5 LLC Wesley F Herek Racing Stable LLC Stiff Ken and Stiff Tim
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, inside turn, long drive, weakened mid stretch,

ENTRY.NAME: West Warpath
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside turn, saved ground, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Full Magazine
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide turn, bid, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Try Try Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 4 wide turn, mild rally, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Lonestar Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Shackleford Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled, 2 wide, drew off upper stretch, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Payster
ENTRY.COMMENT: through after half, gave way,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: HAWTHORNE RACE 8 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 95. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 23000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $10,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $20,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners of a race at a mile or over since June 12 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Pr ice $20,000 (Claiming races for $16,000 or less not considered in estimating allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUN RUSH set a well rated pace throughout, drew off in upper stretch and led throughout in a good effort. JEFF THE LION was allowed to settled then rallied on the far turn, was inside in the stretch making a bid but was second best in the end. GLOBAL EMPIRE was unhurried early then rallied on the far turn, was inside for the stretch drive and was no threat. PINEDALE was allowed to settled then rallied four wide on the far turn, made a bid then flattened out in the drive. FIRST MASAMUNE allowed to settled then rallied three wide on the far turn making a bid but flattened out in the drive. SEMINOLE BEACH stalked the pace while two wide on the backstretch and into the far turn, made a bid to upper stretch but faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Rush
ENTRY.OWNER: Basler Thomas J and Pohl Dennis
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, well rated, drew off upper stretch, led throughout,

ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide 2nd turn, bid, faltered,

ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, bid, flattened out,
